# Tuki Studio Cookie Policy

**Last updated:** October 2025

## 1. What are cookies?

Cookies are small text files stored on your device (computer, mobile, tablet, etc.) when you visit certain web pages.

They allow the site to remember your actions and preferences (such as language, login, or display settings) for a period of time, providing a more efficient and personalized experience.

---

## 2. What types of cookies does this website use?

On the **Tuki Studio** website (https://tukistudio.com) we use first-party and third-party cookies for the following purposes:

### a) By the entity that manages them:

- **First-party cookies:** Managed by Tuki Studio and necessary for the basic operation of the site.
- **Third-party cookies:** Sent to your device from domains managed by third parties, such as Google or YouTube.

### b) By their purpose:

- **Technical or necessary cookies:** Enable navigation and use of essential website features. No consent required.
- **Analytics cookies:** Allow us to know the number of users and statistically analyze site usage to improve our content and services.
- **Multimedia cookies (YouTube):** Enable playback of embedded videos and record anonymous data about user interaction with such content.

### c) By their duration:

- **Session cookies:** Deleted when you close your browser.
- **Persistent cookies:** Remain on your device for a set period or until you delete them.

---

## 3. Cookies used on this site

| Name | Type | Owner | Duration | Purpose |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| **_ga** | Analytics | Google Analytics | 2 years | Distinguishes users to generate site usage statistics. |
| **_gid** | Analytics | Google Analytics | 24 hours | Generates statistical data on how visitors use the website. |
| **_gat** | Analytics | Google Analytics | 1 minute | Limits the percentage of requests. |
| **YSC** | Multimedia | YouTube (Google LLC) | Session | Registers a unique ID to keep statistics of YouTube videos viewed by the user. |
| **VISITOR_INFO1_LIVE** | Multimedia | YouTube (Google LLC) | 6 months | Attempts to estimate user bandwidth on pages with embedded YouTube videos. |
| **CONSENT** | Technical | Google LLC | 2 years | Manages consent for YouTube cookies and other Google services. |

> Note: The list may vary depending on updates to third-party services used on the website.

---

## 4. Legal basis for the use of cookies

- **Technical or necessary cookies** are installed based on Tuki Studio's **legitimate interest** in ensuring the proper functioning of the website.
- The use of **analytics and multimedia cookies** is carried out only after obtaining your **express consent**, given via the banner or cookie settings panel.

---

## 5. How to accept, reject, or configure cookies

When you first access our website, a cookie banner is displayed allowing you to:

- **Accept all cookies**
- **Reject all non-essential cookies**
- **Configure preferences**

You can modify or withdraw your consent at any time via the “**Cookie Settings**” link available in the footer, or from your browser settings.

Below are links to manage cookies in major browsers:

- Google Chrome
- Mozilla Firefox
- Safari
- Microsoft Edge

---

## 6. International data transfers

The use of Google Analytics and YouTube may involve possible international data transfers to **Google LLC**, located in the United States.

Google has **Standard Contractual Clauses** approved by the European Commission, which guarantee an adequate level of protection in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

---

## 7. Data controller

**Tuki Studio**

Website: https://tukistudio.com

Contact email: hola**@tukistudio.com**

Purpose: traffic analysis and improvement of website content.

For more information about personal data processing, please consult our Privacy Policy (add this link if you already have it or we can prepare it later).

---

## 8. Updating the Cookie Policy

Tuki Studio may modify this Cookie Policy in response to new legal requirements or to adapt it to instructions issued by the AEPD.

Users are advised to review it periodically.
